awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Mathematical Methods for Biological  Rhythms and Population Genetics
awd_abstract_narration: 8901599                                                                         Hoppensteadt                                                                         Problems from physiological control mechanisms, microbial                  ecology and population genetics will be investigated.  The                      emphasis of these projects is on collaboration between                          experiments and analysis of them through mathematical modeling,                 analysis, numerical simulation and computation.  Some of these                  involve novel problems in nonlinear oscillations, perturbation                  theory, integrated circuit design and analysis, and transport                   and chemical kinetics describing biological phenomena, and                      others pertain to continuing projects currently supported by an                 NSF grant that have been yielding quite promising results.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
